body_html:
While we are on this topic, how about new_eye instead of eye_like? Since new_eye always takes in shape (or size of the diagonal in this case), it won't be ambiguous.

Related: should we have new_randn and new_rand? I find them rather helpful in writing device-agnostic model.
body_text:
While we are on this topic, how about new_eye instead of eye_like?  Since new_eye always takes in shape (or size of the diagonal in this case), it won't be ambiguous.
Related: should we have new_randn and new_rand? I find them rather helpful in writing device-agnostic model.
body:
While we are on this topic, how about `new_eye` instead of `eye_like`?  Since `new_eye` always takes in shape (or size of the diagonal in this case), it won't be ambiguous.

Related: should we have `new_randn` and `new_rand`? I find them rather helpful in writing device-agnostic model.
